archiefmat.titel: Commissie belast met protectie van de Indianen en Bosnegers
archiefmat.titel_eng: Committee charged with the protection of the indigenous population and Maroons
archiefmat.scope: Contains correspondence received from authorities in the districts, among others A. Kappler, posthouder in Albina and of Granmans (maroon chiefs).
archiefmat.notes: The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version.
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: Niet helemaal kunnen bekijken ivm uiterste kwetsbaarheid van het materiaal.
